author: brett
msg: [MNG-4074] Fixing cyclic reference problem with a parent pom declaring one of its modules as a plugin-level dependency in a plugin it uses. Also, fixing a problem where the version-expression transformation chokes on invalid POMs from the repository during invoker:install.

author: brett
msg: [MNG-4079] Fix duplication of error messages from sources like compiler errors.
